meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Hatom Token, Hatom Ecosystem, HTM Token, HTM Crypto, HTM Staking, Hatom Protocol, HTM Invest

meta.name: content
meta.content: Hatom Token is a new kind of cryptocurrency that allows you to stake your HTM tokens to earn rewards. The Hatom Protocol is a groundbreaking new way to invest in crypto and the HTM Token is the key to unlocking its potential. The HTM token is the native currency of the Hatom ecosystem.

meta.name: twitter:description
meta.content: Elrond's First Platform for Lending and Borrowing Crypto Assets - You can supply & borrow Egld, Mex, Ride & USD coins & earn on your deposits using our decentralized lending protocol that operates on the Elrond Network.

Elrond's First Platform for Lending and Borrowing Crypto Assets - You can supply & borrow Egld, Mex, Ride & USD coins & earn on your deposits using our decentralized lending protocol that operates on the Elrond Network.

div.class: fixed z-50 bottom-0 right-0 p-4 transition-all duration-150 ease-in-out translate-y-full
relative bg-black font-semibold text-[13px] leading-snug sm:leading-normal sm:text-sm text-white p-2 py-3 sm:p-4 border border-indigo-500 rounded-2xl flex items-start max-w-[600px]

button.class: absolute top-2.5 right-3 hover:scale-105 transition-transform cursor-pointer

div.p: This site uses cookies to deliver its service and to analyse traffic. By browsing this site, you accept our Cookie policy.

absolute z-10 inset-0 mt-3.5 flex gap-1.5 justify-center

appButton relative z-[5] rounded-md hover:ring-2 p-0.5 ring-indigo-500

text-lg w-5/6 text-center text-[#3D906A] tracking-wide z-20

div.div: Deep dive into the heart of Hatom Protocol

img.class: loading-resource absolute top-0 inset-0 z-40 w-full

section.class: w-full flex flex-col lg:block bg-white text-black dark:bg-indigo-1000 dark:text-white lg:h-[848px] pt-[56vw] sm:pt-[35vw] lg:py-0 pb-36 overflow-hidden

small.class: text-[#5C5C5C] text-base lg:text-lg leading-none inline-block w-[262px] lg:w-auto

div.small: Paid out to Hatom Token Holders over 3 years

button.class: py-4 !px-4 !w-auto !max-w-[auto] text-base sm:text-lg text-white cursor-pointer rounded-lg p-4 px-9 leading-[1.25] font-medium [background:linear-gradient(270deg,_#1B4347_-1.39%,_#3D906A_99.46%)]

h2.class: font-semibold text-3xl text-center lg:text-left lg:text-[40px] leading-[1.25] block lg:inline-block w-72 mx-auto lg:w-auto

div.class: hidden lg:block xl:hidden absolute left-1/2 top-3 -translate-x-1/2
flex flex-col items-center text-center lg:text-left gap-14 justify-between w-[295px] mx-auto

div.p: Stake your Hatom tokens to earn a share of the protocol's revenue. Dividends are paid in EGLD, USDC, MEX, HTM, and RIDE.
Decide which token should be listed next, and what upgrade or feature should be integrated into the protocol.

div.class: space-y-6 leading-tight xl:pr-10 lg:w-[250px] xl:w-[330.3px] lg:text-sm xl:text-base block3
div.p: Hatom token holders can use the HTM Money Market to :

li.class: relative before:absolute before:-left-[30px] before:top-1 before:w-2 before:h-2 before:rounded-full before:bg-[#179C64] dark:opacity-40

ul.li: Supply HTM and earn interest on their deposit.

li.class: relative before:absolute before:-left-[30px] before:top-1 before:w-2 before:h-2 before:rounded-full before:bg-[#179C64] dark:opacity-40

ul.li: Use HTM as collateral and take a loan of any available crypto asset.

section.class: w-full text-white mx-auto [background:linear-gradient(100.1deg,_#132878_-3.95%,_#03192F_21.83%,_#021326_98.76%,_#00460F_103.65%)] lg:h-[780px] py-16 lg:py-0

div.class: grid sm:grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 gap-10 lg:gap-4 justify-between flex-wrap items-start mt-8 md:mt-16

div.div: Buy Hatom tokens and take part of a growing ecosystem.

a.class: tracking-wider uppercase text-xs inline-flex items-center gap-2 font-bold text-blue p-2 -m-2 hover:bg-blue/5 hover:text-blue/80 rounded leading-none

div.div: Take part in the development of the ecosystem and have access to a tremendous staking yield.

a.class: tracking-wider uppercase text-xs inline-flex items-center gap-2 font-bold text-blue p-2 -m-2 hover:bg-blue/5 hover:text-blue/80 rounded leading-none

div.div: Go through our whitepaper to have a better grasp of our protocol.

a.class: tracking-wider uppercase text-xs inline-flex items-center gap-2 font-bold text-blue p-2 -m-2 hover:bg-blue/5 hover:text-blue/80 rounded leading-none

div.blockquote: “Hatom is the key financial instrument that will open the floodgates to DeFi investment in the Elrond ecosystem and we are proud to be a part of it.”

div.class: text-[#173068] dark:text-blue font-semibold text-xl md:text-2xl md:leading-[38px]

section.class: w-full text-white mx-auto [background:linear-gradient(90deg,_#265B5C_0%,_#11206B_100%)] flex items-center justify-center py-10 lg:h-[301px]

p.class: opacity-60 md:opacity-80 mt-2 text-lg md:text-xl tracking-tight px-7 md:px-0

div.p: Subscribe to our newsletter and stay updated on the latest developments.

Visit our docs section for more information.","sub-title":"The most protected lending platform in the market"},"supply-balance":"Supply balance","net-apy":"Net APY","max":"Max","supply-rates":"Supply rates","supply-apy":"Supply APY","borrow-apy":"Borrow APY","supply-limit":"Supply limit","supply-limit-used":"Supply limit used","no-funds-available":"No funds available","no-funds-to-withdraw":"No funds to withdraw","currently-supplying":"Currently supplying","limit":"Limit","repay":"Repay","withdraw":"Withdraw","borrow-rates":"Borrow rates","borrow-limit":"Borrow limit","borrow-balance":"Borrow balance","borrow-limit-used":"Borrow limit used","borrow-limit-reached":"Borrow limit reached","currently-borrowing":"Currently borrowing","no-balance-to-repay":"No balance to repay","wallet-balance":"Wallet balance","enables-as-collateral":"Enables as Collateral","learn-more":"Learn more","use-token-as-collateral":"Use {{token}} as collateral","apy-accrued":"APY/Accrued","apy-earned":"APY/Earned","of-limit":"% of limit","pending-transactions":"Pending transactions","all-markets":"All Markets","balance":"Balance","insufficient-collateral":"Insufficient collateral","transaction-pending":"Transaction pending","transaction-broadcast":"Transaction broadcast","view-on-explorer":"View on explorer","collateral-popup":{"alert":"Each asset used as collateral increases your borrowing limit. Be careful, this can subject the asset to being seized in liquidation."},"disclaimer":"Disclaimer","legal-information":"Legal information","newsletter-form":{"title":"Subscribe to Hatom newsletter","hint":"Subscribe to our newsletter and stay updated on the latest developments.","placeholder":"Enter your email","messages":{"required":"This field is required!","invalid":"Invalid email address!","done":"You have successfully subscribed to the newsletter!","duplicate":"You are already subscribed."}},"subscribe":"Subscribe","partners-marquee":{"elrond":"Elrond Network is a highly scalable, fast and secure blockchain platform for distributed apps, enterprise use cases and the new internet economy.","rather-labs":"Rather Labs are blockchain technical partners who provide the blockchain expertise along with the partner intensity founders need.","maiar":"Maiar is powered by the amazing technology of the Elrond blockchain, and is going to radically change the way we interact with money.","quote":"Hatom is the key financial instrument that will open the floodgates to DeFi investment in the Elrond ecosystem and we are proud to be a part of it."},"partners":"Partners","understand-hatom":{"title":"Understanding Hatom","step1":{"caption":"Get Hatom","description":"Buy Hatom tokens and take part of a growing ecosystem."},"step2":{"caption":"Benefits of Hatom token","description":"Take part in the development of the ecosystem and have access to a tremendous staking yield."},"step3":{"caption":"White Paper","description":"Go through our whitepaper to have a better grasp of our protocol."}},"hatom-features":{"cta-btn":"Buy Hatom Tokens","hint":"Paid out to Hatom Token Holders over 3 years","title":"\u003cspan class='text-blue'\u003eFeatures\u003c/span\u003e of Hatom Token","p1-text":"Stake your Hatom tokens to earn a share of the protocol's revenue. Dividends are paid in EGLD, USDC, MEX, HTM, and RIDE.","p2-text":"Decide which token should be listed next, and what upgrade or feature should be integrated into the protocol.","p3":"Hatom token holders can use the HTM Money Market to :","p3-list":{"line1":"Supply HTM and earn interest on their deposit.","line2":"Use HTM as collateral and take a loan of any available crypto asset."}},"earn":"Earn","features":"Features","of":"Of","dividends":"Dividends","lab-tube":{"help":"Deep dive into the heart of Hatom Protocol"},"disclaimer-text":["The user will undertake every effort to ensure the safe operation of the website. Under no circumstance shall Hatom Labs LLC have any liability to the operator for any loss or damage of any kind incurred as a result of defects such as falsification of data, interruption of operations, virus attack, or reliance on any information provided on the site. The use of the site and reliance on any information on the site is solely at the user’s own risk and responsibility.","The content of this subpage is a general information of Hatom Labs LLC.","All information on the Site is provided in good faith for general information purpose only, it does not constitute an offer document, a solicitation for investment, any offer to sell any product or an investment advice. However we make no representation or warranty of any kind, express or implied, regarding the accuracy, adequacy, validity, reliability, availability or completeness of any information on the site.","The same applies to the content of external links belonging to or originating from third parties that this website may contain.","We reserve the right to make changes and additions to the content of the website without prior notice.","We do not warrant, endorse, guarantee or assume responsibility for the content of the website or any damages resulting from or in connection with downloaded information or documents.","This includes both material and immaterial damage."],"market-overview":"Market overview","total-supply":"Total supply","total-borrow":"Total borrow","top-markets":"Top {{count}} markets","24h-supply-volume":"24H supply volume","24h-borrow-volume":"24H borrow volume","of-suppliers":"# of suppliers","of-borrowers":"# of borrowers","market":"Market","interest-rate-model":"Interest rate model","market-details":"Market details","market-contract":"Market contract","utilization-vs-apy":"Utilization vs apy","estimated-yearly-interest":"Estimated yearly interest","reserve-factor":"Reserve factor","collateral-factor":"Collateral factor","liquidation-factor":"Liquidation factor","close-factor":"Close factor","liquidation-penalty":"Liquidation penalty","exchange-rate":"Exchange rate","not-available-asset":"This asset is not available yet","view-docs":"View docs","assets":"Assets","reporters":"Reporters","price-page":{"title":"Open price feed","description":"The Open Price Feed is a system to allow various sources (i.e. reporters) to sign off-chain data about prices and allow any Elrond account to move that data on-chain."},"votes":"Votes","voting-wallet":"Voting Wallet","htm-hatom-balance":"HTM hatom balance","votes-received":"Votes received","active-proposals":"Active Proposals","view-all-proposals":"View all proposals","active":"Active","for":"For","against":"Against","abstain":"Abstain","days-hours-left":"{{days}} days, {{hours}} hrs left","review":"Review","vote-for":"Vote for","vote-against":"Vote Against","executed":"Executed","failed":"Failed","passed":"Passed","governance-overview":"Governance Overview","view":"View","number-of-proposals":"Number of Proposals","number-of-votes-compted":"Number of Votes Compted","votes-addresses":"Votes addresses","recent-proposals":"Recent proposals","hatom-governance":"Hatom governance","governance-proposals":"Governance proposals","all-proposals":"All proposals","next":"Next","previous":"Previous","governance-page":{"text":"The Hatom Protocol is community-driven, Hatom token-holders vote to decide what feature or what upgrade should be integrated."},"proposal-1":{"label":"Website Translation","details":[{"key":"Objective","value":"Translation of the content."},{"key":"Details","value":"This proposal suggests translating the content of the website to the French, Spanish, Chinese, and Korean languages to simplify the user experience of the Hatom Community."},{"key":"Review","value":"The proposition has been passed. The mentioned languages and the Romanian and Portuguese languages have been added."}]},"proposal-2":{"label":"Governance Contracts","details":[{"key":"Objective","value":"Create the contracts."},{"key":"Details","value":"Make the necessary research and tests on the Elrond Network and design the governance contracts of the protocol. The governance contracts will permit users to vote for the next features, upgrades, or services they want to see integrated into the Hatom protocol."},{"key":"Review","value":"The proposition has been passed. The Governance smart contract was created and is currently undergoing tests."}]},"proposal-3":{"label":"Find price providers","details":[{"key":"Objective","value":"Select price oracle."},{"key":"Details","value":"Define the most reliable price oracle for money markets on the Elrond Blockchain. The price oracle is necessary for the execution of the protocol smart contracts."},{"key":"Review","value":"The proposition has been passed, and the Maiar DEX has been set as a price oracle considering that it is the only one available on the Elrond Blockchain for the moment."}]},"proposal-4":{"label":"Design of Smart Contracts","details":[{"key":"Objective","value":"Create all the smart contracts of the protocol."},{"key":"Details","value":"Define and design all the necessary smart contracts to permit the proper functioning of the Hatom lending protocol. "},{"key":"Review","value":"The proposition has been passed. The different smart contracts of the protocol (Controller, Money market, Interest rate model, Oracle) have been created and are undergoing tests."}]},"proposal-5":{"label":"Add Money Market: RIDE","details":[{"key":"Objective","value":"Adding a new Money Market."},{"key":"Details","value":"The proposition aims to integrate RIDE Money Market into the Hatom Protocol to allow holders of RIDE tokens to benefit from the lending platform services."},{"key":"Review","value":"The proposition has been passed and the Money Market has been integrated."}]},"proposal-6":{"label":"Add Money Market: Locked MEX","details":[{"key":"Objective","value":"Adding a new Money Market."},{"key":"Details","value":"The proposition aims to integrate Locked MEX Money Market into the Hatom Protocol to allow holders of Locked MEX tokens to benefit from the lending platform services."},{"key":"Review","value":"The proposition has been postponed to a later date."}]},"proposal-7":{"label":"Add Money Market: Stablecoins","details":[{"key":"Objective","value":"Selecting and integrating a stablecoin Money Market."},{"key":"Details","value":"The proposition aims to decide which stablecoin should be integrated into the Hatom Protocol. This is a Major integration as stable coins are among the most borrowed crypto assets on lending protocols."},{"key":"Review","value":"The proposition has been passed and the USDC Money Market has been chosen and integrated."}]},"proposal-12":{"label":"Create night mode","details":[{"key":"Objective","value":"Implement a night mode."},{"key":"Details","value":"The proposition suggests the integration of a night mode. The night mode reduces the light emitted by device screens and provides the possibility to use a dark mode for users who prefer it."},{"key":"Review","value":"The proposition has been passed, the night mode has been validated and integrated."}]},"proposal-8":{"label":"Prepare White paper content","details":[{"key":"Objective","value":"Create a White Paper."},{"key":"Details","value":"Create a white paper that describes the protocol and provides detailed information about the functioning of the platform, its roadmap, the Hatom token, and the Team behind it."},{"key":"Review","value":"The proposition has been passed, and the white paper has been created and added to the docs section."}]},"proposal-9":{"label":"Front end integration","details":[{"key":"Objective","value":"Integrate the design."},{"key":"Details","value":"The proposition aims to decide whether to upgrade the site and integrate the latest design validated or to postpone the task to a later date."},{"key":"Review","value":"The proposition has been passed, the new design has been integrated into the site."}]},"proposal-10":{"label":"Design system propositions","details":[{"key":"Objective","value":"Confirming the design system."},{"key":"Details","value":"The proposal consists of choosing the system design between the multiple propositions and completing the UI of the platform in accordance with the final design chosen."},{"key":"Review","value":"The proposition has been passed, and the design system has been confirmed."}]},"proposal-11":{"label":"Development environment","details":[{"key":"Objective","value":"To set up a development environment"},{"key":"Details","value":"The proposal consists of setting up an Elrond development environment for experimental use and test cases."},{"key":"Review","value":"The proposition has been passed, the environment is ready to be used."}]},"proposal-13":{"label":"Deployment on the Testnet","details":[{"key":"Objective","value":"Deploying all the smart contracts on the Testnet."},{"key":"Details","value":"This proposition aims to decide when we should launch the Protocol’s smart contracts on the Testnet."}]},"proposal-14":{"label":"Start of the auditing process","details":[{"key":"Objective","value":"Audit of the protocol"},{"key":"Details","value":"This proposition aims to decide when we should start auditing the protocol"}]},"proposal-15":{"label":"Staking and Safety Module","details":[{"key":"Objective","value":"Creation of the design"},{"key":"Details","value":"The proposition consists of validating the design of the staking and safety module."}]},"proposal-16":{"label":"Deployment on the Mainnet","details":[{"key":"Objective","value":"Deploying the protocol on the Mainnet."},{"key":"Details","value":"This proposition aims to select the date of the protocol’s launch on the Mainnet."}]},"created":"Created","succeeded":"Succeeded","queued":"Queued","proposal-history":"Proposal History","details":"Details","addresses":"Addresses","view-all":"View all","wallet-provider":{"hint":"To start using Hatom","new-to-elrond":"New to Elrond?","wallet-setup":"Learn how to setup a wallet","verification":"Scam/Phishing verification: {{website_link}} Check the website link carefully!"},"account-details":"Account details","your-wallet":"Your wallet","balances":"Balances","history":"History","total-account-balance":"Total account balance","tokens":"Tokens","disconnect":"disconnect","success":"Success","againsts-votes":"Againsts
